our_journey.title: Our Journey
our_journey.description: At RealEstateHub, we are committed to providing premium real estate solutions. With a proven track record and a dedicated team, we have successfully helped numerous clients find their dream properties.

our_values.title: Our Values
our_values.description: At RealEstateHub, we take pride in providing exceptional real estate services. With a strong foundation of trust and expertise, we help clients navigate the property market with confidence.

trust.name: Trust & Integrity
trust.description: At RealEstateHub, we believe trust and integrity are the cornerstones of every real estate transaction. We ensure transparency and professionalism in all our dealings.

expertise.name: Expertise
expertise.description: Our team of experienced real estate professionals is dedicated to providing market insights and expert advice, helping clients make informed decisions.

client_centric.name: Client-Centric Approach
client_centric.description: We prioritize our clients' needs and aspirations, ensuring personalized services that cater to their real estate goals and dreams.

excellence.name: Commitment to Excellence
excellence.description: We are committed to delivering the best real estate solutions, ensuring a seamless and rewarding experience for buyers, sellers, and investors alike.

company_achievements.title: Our Achievements
company_achievements.description: Over the years, we have expanded our reach and expertise in the real estate market. From a small agency to a trusted industry leader, our mission remains focused on delivering quality service and exceptional property solutions to meet our clients' needs.

years_excellence.title: 5+ Years of Real Estate Excellence
years_excellence.description: With over five years in the real estate industry, weâ€™ve built a reputation for trust, quality service, and successful property transactions.

happy_clients.title: Hundreds of Happy Clients
happy_clients.description: Our growing client base reflects our commitment to helping individuals and businesses find their perfect properties with ease and confidence.

award_winning.title: Award-Winning Real Estate Services
award_winning.description: Recognized for excellence, we have earned industry awards for outstanding property management, customer satisfaction, and innovative solutions.

company_banner.title: Find Your Dream Property with Aqarek
company_banner.subtitle: Discover, Buy, Rent, and Invest in the Best Real Estate Properties with ease. Your dream home or investment is just a click away!

wishlistPage.wishlistDescription: Explore a wide range of high-quality materials and tools essential for the oilfield industry. From drilling equipment to maintenance tools, we provide everything you need to ensure efficient operations.

introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to our real estate platform. Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using the website. Your use of the site constitutes full acceptance of these terms.

acceptance.heading: Acceptance of Terms
list: You must be at least 18 years old to use the services
You are responsible for maintaining account confidentiality
Compliance with applicable local and international laws

services.heading: Real Estate Services
services.description: The platform provides real estate brokerage services including:
list: Facilitating communication between buyers and sellers
Providing preliminary real estate and financial information

responsibilities.heading: Responsibilities
list: Ensure accuracy of information in property listings
Commit to payment within specified periods
Do not use the platform for illegal purposes

financial.heading: Financial Transactions
items: - All transactions are subject to 2% service fee
- Refunds are processed according to published policy
- We reserve the right to block suspicious transactions

privacy.heading: Privacy
privacy.text: We protect your personal data according to the latest security standards. We may use contact information to send promotional offers unless you opt out.

modifications.heading: Terms Modifications
modifications.text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, and users will be notified via email or website announcement.

section1.heading: Introduction
section1.content: We at the real estate platform are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our digital platform.

section2.heading: Data We Collect
items: Usage and technical data (IP address, browser type)

section3.heading: How We Use Data
items: Facilitate purchase processes and real estate offers
Improve user experience and personalize offers
Respond to inquiries and technical support

section4.heading: Data Sharing
section4.description: We do not sell your personal data and may share it with:
items: Approved real estate partners with your prior consent

section5.heading: User Rights
items: - Right to request a copy of your personal data
- Right to opt-out of marketing communications

section6.heading: Data Protection
section6.content: We use advanced encryption technologies (SSL) and implement ISO 27001 security standards to protect your data. Data is stored on secure servers in certified geographical locations.

section7.heading: Cookies
section7.content: We use cookies to enhance browsing experience. You can manage preferences through browser settings. Continued use of the site implies your consent to their use.

section8.heading: Policy Changes
section8.content: We may update this policy periodically. The updated version will be published on the platform with an effective date. Please review it regularly.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.message_min_length: Message must be at least 20 characters
contact.error_message: Please check data or reload page
